posts.post_content:
For sale or trade. This group includes two rare Minis and a very scarce 1888 "Jim" Keefe HOF card. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if you have an interest in any of these. I would trade for other Old Judges, Gypsy Queens,  Whitehead and Hoag Pins or M101-4/5 type cards of HOFers. Note: three cards on right had SGC grade cut off by image--All are "A". Virtually all Minis are given an "A" and the Alcott-Mansfield card has corner clips.

Thanks--Jay
Neat stuff jay. Are any for sale or trade only?

Hi Jay,

Got any new Indy players?

Thanks,
Ted
Hi Ted! I have 1887 cards, but not 1889 cards. Some of the players featured on the 1887 cards, however, were on the 1889 team. If you drop me an email I'll let you know what players are available.
I do not have a McCormick.

Sorry, my eyes aren't what they used to be.  Are there any Des Moines players available?

Thanks,
Andy
Unfortunately, mine aren't either. No Des Moines cards in the group.
